summary: The video shows how to enable screen recording on older iPhones. It guides the viewer to navigate to Settings, then Control Center, and add 'Screen Recording' to the included controls by pressing the plus sign. Finally, it demonstrates how to access screen recording from the Control Center by swiping down.
transcript: This is how you access screen record on your older iPhone. First you go to settings, then click Control Center. My phone shows screen recording. Scroll down until you see screen recording with the little green plus sign. Here! As you see here. Press the plus sign and you now see it on the top. You can pull up on the screen to easily get your screen recording just like you would camera and everything else. Press that button and now you can screen record. Have fun.
